enum.name: AUTONOMY_DEMAND
enum.description: Demands to be made to the autonomy system.

entry.name: AUTONOMY_DEMAND_GO_TO_RECOVERY
entry.description: Abort Autonomy System to the Recovery Point.

enum.name: AUTONOMY_COMPONENT
enum.description: These encode the components that can be present in an autonomy system.

enum.name: AUTONOMY_STATE
enum.description: Current state of the Autonomy System.

entry.name: AUTONOMY_STATE_EXECUTING
entry.description: Autonomy System Executing and in control.

entry.name: AUTONOMY_STATE_RECOVERING
entry.description: Autonomy System heading to recovery position.

enum.name: VEHICLE_MODE
enum.description: Current mode of a squad vehicle.

entry.name: VEHICLE_MODE_MISSION_FAULT
entry.description: There is a fault with the current mission.

entry.name: VEHICLE_MODE_MISSION_ABORT
entry.description: The current mission has been aborted.

entry.name: VEHICLE_MODE_BASELINE_MISSION
entry.description: The vehicle is executing its baseline mission.

entry.name: VEHICLE_MODE_REMOTE_MISSION
entry.description: The vehicle is executing a remote mission.

enum.name: PAYLOAD_HEALTH
enum.description: Flags to report health of a registered payload.

enum.name: PAYLOAD_STATE
enum.description: Flags to report state of a registered payload.

enum.name: PAYLOAD_LIST_RESULT
enum.description: Results of payload discovery operation (in a PAYLOAD_LIST_ACK message).

entry.name: PAYLOAD_LIST_ERROR
entry.description: Generic error with downloading Payload List.

entry.name: PAYLOAD_LIST_REPEATED_ID
entry.description: Multiple entries for same Payload ID in List.

enum.name: MAV_SYS_STATUS_SENSOR_EXTENDED
enum.description: These encode the sensors whose status is sent as part of the SYS_STATUS message in the extended fields.

enum.name: MAV_CMD
enum.description: Commands to be executed by the MAV. They can be executed on user request, or as part of a mission script. If the action is used in a mission, the parameter mapping to the waypoint/mission message is as follows: Param 1, Param 2, Param 3, Param 4, X: Param 5, Y:Param 6, Z:Param 7. This command list is similar what ARINC 424 is for commercial aircraft: A data format how to interpret waypoint/mission data. NaN and INT32_MAX may be used in float/integer params (respectively) to indicate optional/default values (e.g. to use the component's current yaw or latitude rather than a specific value). See https://mavlink.io/en/guide/xml_schema.html#MAV_CMD for information about the structure of the MAV_CMD entries

entry.name: MAV_CMD_AUTONOMY_DEMAND
entry.description: Send Autonomy Demand to Autonomy System.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_PAYLOAD_SET_STATE
entry.description: Set the states for the payload with the specified ID. Command will be rejected if trying to set a state not supported by the payload. Note that this command should always be sent as COMMAND_INT which has param5/x as int32_t rather than float.
entry.param: Payload ID, 0 to apply to all Payloads in List.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_TRACK_START
entry.description: Navigate between two points maintaining trackline between them
entry.param: Maximum distance from track centre-line before correction is required

entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_TRACK_END
entry.description: Navigate between two points maintaining trackline between them

message.name: AUTONOMY_STATUS
message.description: The state of the autonomy system.
message.field: Bitmap showing which autonomy components are present. Value of 0: not present. Value of 1: present.
Bitmap showing which autonomy components are enabled: Value of 0: not enabled. Value of 1: enabled.
Bitmap showing which autonomy components have an error (or are operational). Value of 0: error. Value of 1: healthy.
The Execution state of the Autonomy System.

message.name: MESSAGE_CONTACT_SNIPPET
message.description: Contact snippet message to be sent to specified destination, as well as confidence of contact snippet.
message.field: Length of the data transported in message.
Variable length message. The message length is defined by message_length.

message.name: MESSAGE_AUTONOMY_MISSION_STATUS
message.description: Autonomy System Mission Status message to be sent to specified destination.
message.field: Source Vehicle ID. UINT8_MAX: field not provided.
Length of the data transported in message.
Variable length message. The message length is defined by message_length.

message.name: SQUAD_VEHICLE_STATE
message.description: Vehicle state data recieved from another vehicle in the squad.
message.field: Current depth in meters positive down from the surface.
Heading in degrees clockwise from North.
Remaining battery energy. Values: [0-100], -1: autopilot does not estimate the remaining battery.
Vehicle faults - defined specific to vehicle.

message.name: PAYLOAD_REQUEST_LIST
message.description: Request the list of registered payloads from the system/component.

message.name: PAYLOAD_COUNT
message.description: Emitted as response to PAYLOAD_REQUEST_LIST, the sender can then request the details of each payload in sequence.

message.name: PAYLOAD_LIST_ITEM_REQUEST
message.description: Request the details of the payload item with the specified list position. The response of the system to this message should be a PAYLOAD_LIST_ITEM message.

message.name: PAYLOAD_LIST_ITEM
message.description: This message is emitted as response to PAYLOAD_REQUEST_LIST, and contains the details (ID, Type, Name) of the specified Payload.
message.field: Bitmap showing the valid states of the payload. Value of 0: state cannot be changed. Value of 1: state can be changed.

message.name: PAYLOAD_LIST_ACK
message.description: Acknowledgment message during payload handling. The type field states if this message is a positive ack (type=0) or if an error happened (type=non-zero).

message.name: PAYLOAD_STATUS_REQUEST
message.description: Request the status of the payload item with the specified payload ID. The response of the system to this message should be a PAYLOAD_STATUS message. Note: this message has been deprecated in favor of using MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE with param1 specifiying the message ID and param2 specifying the payload ID.

message.name: PAYLOAD_STATUS
message.description: This message is emitted as response to MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE with param1 specifying the message ID (44206) andparam2 specifying the payload ID, and contains the details (ID and Type) and health and status (as bitmasks) of the specified payload.
message.field: Bitmap showing the health of the payload. Value of 0: issue with health. Value of 1: healthy.
Bitmap showing the states of payload. Value of 0: state is false. Value of 1: state is true.

message.name: PAYLOAD_CHANGE
message.description: Broadcast on change of Payload List, specifies the change (added/removed) and ID of the payload.
message.field: Payload ID change, value 1 : ID Added, value 0 : ID Removed

message.name: WATER_CURRENT
message.description: Water current values. Note: Calculated Water current = (Vehicle Velocity - Measured Current).
message.field: Raw Measured water current in X (NED) direction
Raw Measured water current in Y (NED) direction
Raw Measured water current in Z (NED) direction

message.name: DVL
message.description: Doppler Velocity Log Sensor. Used to provide vehicle velocity.
message.field: Boolean indicating if the DVL has bottom lock to the floor (true: 1, false: 0).
Vehicle altitude to the floor of body of water for each beam
